quantity.label: Currency gain
quantity.tooltip:
How many points the users will earn at each interval.
0 will disable automatic gain.

frequency.label: Interval between currency gains
frequency.tooltip: This will give users currency at the specified interval.

only_subs.label: Only subs will gain currency
only_subs.tooltip: If turned on, only subs will gain currency at each interval.

gain_offline.label: Gain currency while offline
gain_offline.tooltip: If turned on, users on the channel will gain currency while the stream is offline.

exclude_users.label: Exclude users (separate with ,)
exclude_users.tooltip: Put usernames that aren't going to gain currency. Each username separated by a comma.

msg_whisper.label: Whisper answers
msg_whisper.tooltip: If turned on, bot will reply this currency commands only with whispers.

msg_count.label: How many currency the user has
msg_count.tooltip:
Displays how many currency the user has.
$(user): user's name
$(points): how many
$(currency): currency's name

msg_increment.label: Add currency for a user
msg_increment.tooltip:
Displays new amount after some currency is added.
$(user): user's name
$(points): how many added
$(currency): currency's name
$(current): currency amount after adding

msg_decrement.label: Remove currency for a user
msg_decrement.tooltip:
Displays new amount after some currency is removed.
$(user): user's name
$(points): how many removed
$(currency): currency's name
$(current): currency amount after remove

streamlabs_apikey.label: Streamlabs Socket API Token
streamlabs_apikey.tooltip: If using streamlabs notifications, enter the socket api token. See README for instructions.

streamlabs_bits.label: Bits to currency unit
streamlabs_bits.tooltip: How many currency the user will gain with one bit.

export_and_view.label: Export and View Current
export_and_view.tooltip: Exports users' currency to a txt and view it.

loot_notification.label: Loot notification user
loot_notification.tooltip: Which user will receive notification when loot is consumed. Usually the caster.
